otherNames: Doraemon the Movie 2018: Nobita's Treasure Island, 映画 ドラえもん のび太の宝島
synopsis: Doraemon: Nobita no Takarajima takes the well-known characters to the Caribbean Sea; Nobita is the captain of a ship and fights against his enemies. Shizuka is kidnapped and a storm prevents her persecution. When the adventurers finally find the mysterious Treasure Island, where they have taken Shizuka, they discover that it is something more than a common island.
